column1: court.5030.desc_young0:"The adults around me are always unhappy and want me to help them
column2: but I think I would rather help beat the fearsome dragon [child.GetSheHe] seems to be fighting!"

column1: court.5030.desc0:"I've been listening to people moan and complain the whole day and I'm so #EMP bored#! that I can't help my focus shifting to whatever game [child.GetSheHe] is playing..."
court.5030.desc_ending0:"\n\n[child.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] sees me looking and waves for me to join [child.GetHerHim]."
court.5030.b0:"This is no place for games."
court.5040.desc0:"Yet again I am forced to listen to people complain – [prank_alternative_1.Custom2('MyCharacterIntroduction'
column4: ROOT.Char)] claims that my court has grown dull
column6: ROOT.Char)] thinks there has been too many meals containing animal bladders lately

column1: court.5040.a0:"I must resist and behave like a proper [ROOT.Char.GetLadyLord]."
court.5040.b0:"An inflated bladder on [prank_alternative_1.GetFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] chair – now that's attention!"
court.5040.c0:"[prank_alternative_2.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] letting forth a fart would be anything but dull."
court.5040.d0:"[prank_alternative_3.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] will find a bladder on [prank_alternative_3.GetHerHis] chair instead of plate!"

court.5041.desc_option_10:"While [prank_target.GetTitledFirstName] is distracted during dinner I carefully sprinkle small pieces of a lyre's string onto [prank_target.GetHerHis] plate.\n\nI can barely contain my laughter as [prank_target.GetSheHe] turns back only to find the plate before [prank_target.GetHerHim] crawling with maggots
column2: but I need to avoid suspicion if I am to continue this crusade!"

column1: court.5041.desc_option_20:"I dried the blood of a calf and made it into a powder
column2: which I then sprinkle onto [prank_target.GetTitledFirstNamePossessive] steak when [prank_target.GetSheHe] isn't looking. Instantly the powder liquefies into blood and it is all I can do not to laugh as [prank_target.GetFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] face twists in horror as the steak starts to bleed before [prank_target.GetHerHim]!"

column1: court.5041.desc_option_30:"In secret I task some servants to find me snakes – as many as possible. Then
column3: I have them loose the snakes in [prank_target.GetHerHis] quarters. The screams echoing down the halls on [prank_target.GetHerHis] return sends me into fits!"

column1: court.5041.desc_option_40:"I crush some incense into a very fine powder before hiding it in my hand. Then
column2: as we sit across from each other at the table with a candle between us
column3: I hurl my hand towards [prank_target.GetTitledFirstNamePossessive] face. As the powder pass through the flame it ignites quite spectacularly!\n\n[prank_target.GetSheHe|U] screams
column5: but I know it's just a trick and laugh merrily."

column1: court.5041.desc_option_50:"I carefully crack open the door to [prank_target.GetTitledFirstNamePossessive] quarters and
column3: I ever so slowly bring a full chamber pot to rest on top of the door frame. Then: a quick knock and an even quicker escape around the corner.\n\nWho is–"" #EMP Splash!#!"""

column1: court.5041.desc_opening0:"#EMP Brrt!#!\n\nThe sound rips through the hall as [prank_target.Custom2('MyCharacterIntroduction'
column3: and [prank_target.GetHerHis] face only grows redder as the silence drags on. I struggle to contain my laughter
column4: but if I am to prank [prank_target.GetHerHim] again I need to avoid suspicion!"

column1: court.5041.option_10:"[prank_target.GetHerHis|U] next meal will be full of maggots""!"""
court.5041.option_20:"The next steak [prank_target.GetSheHe] eats will appear bleeding!"
court.5041.option_30:"I will set snakes loose in [prank_target.GetHerHis] quarters!"
court.5041.option_40:"I will scare [prank_target.GetHerHim] with flammable powder!"
court.5041.option_50:"A surprise will be waiting for [prank_target.GetHerHim] on top of [prank_target.GetHerHis] chamber door!"

column2: ROOT.Char)|U] fails to see the humor in it though.\n\nI know it is you pulling these infernal pranks around court."""
and what the snakes did to [prank_target.GetHerHis] face... It's a disgrace. Your grace.""

column1: court.5042.desc_chastiser_no_snake0: Poor [prank_target.GetTitledFirstName] jumps at every shadow! It's a disgrace... your grace."""""
court.5042.desc_no_chastiser0:"My courtiers fail to see the humor in it though
column2: and they make it abundantly clear that they will condemn any further pranking. And that they will be on their guard."

column1: court.5050.desc0:"Why would you honor that [courtier_given_title.Custom('InsultNoun')] [courtier_given_title.GetTitledFirstName] with a position at court and not me?""\n\n[courtier.Custom2('MyCharacterIntroduction'
column2: ROOT.Char)|U] is livid. Apparently [courtier.GetSheHe] had been certain that the honor would befall [courtier.GetHerHim]

column1: court.5050.c0:"If you're gonna jest like this I should start paying you!"

column2: ROOT.Char)] has neither the talent nor the drive to paint the masterpiece [painter.GetSheHe] promised me.\n\nI was just a child in want of attention. To think you truly believed my nonsense!"""""

column1: court.5057.b0:"No one makes a fool out of me!"
